short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the ability to upload right to artifactory from polarion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to upload files to artifactory from polarion. 

In Polarion, copy the Widget source code for a generic button, and place it in a script (inline or block) widget. Give the outer span element an id of test. In the onclick for the button, which is in the sub with an id of "script," place the URL within an encodeURIComponent function. An example use case is for test runs, I have created a button which appends the test ID to the artifactory root. This way, using the button allows the user to upload directly to the corresponding folder in artifactory.

This is a highly specific use case, please contact me, or see the GitHub if it seems close to what you need and I might be able to make it more generic
